StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetMapsSectorRecruiterByRecruiterPersonID]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Recrui.ngPersonID uniqueidentifier AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT MSR.SectorRecruiterId, MSR.SectorID, MSR.Recrui.ngPersonId, MSR.LastUpdateUserId, MS.SectorDesignator
FROM [usmc].[MapsSectorRecruiter] MSR INNER JOIN [usmc].[MapsSector] MS ON MSR.SectorID=MS.SectorID
WHERE MSR.Recrui.ngPersonId = @Recrui.ngPersonID
END
